parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the description shown in the HUD while the waypoint is active.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint '''setWaypointDescription''' text

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> text: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[_grp, 2] [[setWaypointDescription]] "Move here.";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypoints]], [[deleteWaypoint]], [[copyWaypoints]], [[setCurrentWaypoint]], [[setWaypointBehaviour]], [[setWaypointCombatMode]], [[setWaypointCompletionRadius]], [[setWaypointFormation]], [[setWaypointHousePosition]], [[setWaypointPosition]], [[setWaypointScript]], [[setWaypointSpeed]], [[setWaypointStatements]], [[setWaypointTimeout]], [[setWaypointType]], [[setWaypointVisible]], [[waypointAttachVehicle]], [[waypointAttachedVehicle]], [[setWaypointLoiterRadius]], [[waypointLoiterRadius]], [[addWaypoint]], [[setWaypointLoiterType]], [[waypointSpeed]]
</value></part></template>
